author: cmpilato
msg: * libsvn_wc/log.c
(log_do_committed): Bug fix.  Only "modify" entry in parent if we
*have* an entry in parent.

author: sussman
msg: Implement 'tmp file' client callbacks for RA to use on the
client-side;  make ra_dav actually use the callbacks.
* svn_ra.h (svn_ra_callbacks_t): revise args to
open_tmp_file(). "close on delete" in now automatic.
* svn_wc.h, adm_files.c (svn_wc_create_tmp_file):  declare and implement.
* auth.c (open_tmp_file:  implement wrapper that makes use of callback_baton.
(svn_client__get_ra_callbacks):  return the wrapper.
* svn_io.h, io.c (svn_io_open_unique_file): take a delete_on_close flag now.
* get_editor.c (close_file):  change callers of svn_io_open_unique_file.
* props.c (svn_wc__do_property_merge): same.
* fetch.c (svn_ra_dav__do_update): use new callback.  No need to
explicitly delete tmpfile anymore.
(reporter_set_path):     no need to explicitly delete tmpfile anymore.
(reporter_delete_path):  same.
(reporter_abort_report): same.
(reporter_finish_report): use apr_portable.h to get the file
descriptor of the tmpfile, which is wanted by neon.
* commit.c (commit_apply_txdelta): use new callback.
(commit_stream_close): use apr_portable.h to get the file descriptor
of the tmpfile, which is wanted by neon.

author: gstein
msg: Enable fetching of properties during an initial checkout.
(add_props): look for "svn:" properties and pass them through to the WC.
Revamp the logic a bit to create just a single buffer and reuse it.

author: gstein
msg: apr_proc_wait() now has an exit code parameter. Pass NULL since we
don't want the value (yet).
* libsvn_subr/io.c (svn_io_run_cmd): pass NULL to apr_proc_wait()
* libsvn_wc/get_editor.c (close_file): pass NULL to apr_proc_wait()

author: joe
msg: * Makefile.in: don't use an absolute path for true, as it can show up
in different places on different operating systems.
Patch by: Garrett Rooney <rooneg@electricjellyfish.net>
